name: plant-beta
description: Plant is a 2 players strategy game, where the goal is to take as much space as possible on the terrain with a plant by making it growing.

scripts.package-win: electron-packager . plant-beta --platform=win32 --arch=all --prune=true --out=beta-builds --ignore=".vscode" --asar --version-string.CompanyName="by Picorims and Cirno" --version-string.FileDescription="Plant is a 2 players strategy game, where the goal is to take as much space as possible on the terrain with a plant by making it growing." --version-string.ProductName="Plant Beta" --version-string.ProductVersion="0.1.0(b5)"

author: Picorims<picorims.contact@gmail.com> and Cirno
